Sql.query: select a.emprcodi as EMPRCODI, (select b.emprnomb from vw_trn_empresa_str b where b.emprcodi = a.emprcodi) as EMPRESA, (select c.vtranetotal from trn_valor_trans_empresa c where c.emprcodi = a.emprcodi and c.pericodi = a.pericodi and c.vtraneversion = a.vtotemversion) as VALORIZACION, (select sum(d.ingcomimporte) from trn_ing_compensacion d where d.emprcodi = a.emprcodi and d.pericodi = a.pericodi and d.ingcomversion = a.vtotemversion ) as COMPENSACION , (select f.ingpotimporte from trn_ing_potencia f where f.emprcodi = a.emprcodi and f.pericodi = a.pericodi and f.ingpotversion = a.vtotemversion) as IP, (select e.salempsaldo from trn_saldo_empresa e where e.emprcodi = a.emprcodi and e.pericodi = a.pericodi and e.salempversion = a.vtotemversion) as SALDOTRANSMISION, (select g.salrscsaldo from trn_saldo_coresc g where g.emprcodi = a.emprcodi and g.pericodi = a.pericodi and g.salrscversion = a.vtotemversion) as SALDOSINCONTRATO, a.vtotemtotal from trn_valor_total_empresa a where a.pericodi = :pericodi and a.vtotemversion = :vtotemversion order by 2
